title: AI-Enhanced Inverse Modeling Framework
abstract: Research manuscript exploring an explainable AI method for parameter inversion in physics-based models, combining uncertainty quantification and interpretable latent parameter spaces.

title: Aegis: An AI-Driven Innovation & Simulation Framework
abstract: Technical whitepaper describing a modular framework that integrates simulation data, explainable ML, and distributed HPC pipelines for reproducible experimentation and model comparison.

title: CredScore: Explainable Credit Risk Modeling
abstract: Report documenting an interpretable credit scoring engine using tree-based models and SHAP/LIME explanations, developed for the Finastra AI Innovation Challenge 2022.

title: AI-Driven Fraud Detection Engine
abstract: Internal report on a hybrid anomaly detection and NLP pipeline for real-time financial transaction monitoring.

title: Cloud HPC Workflow Simulator: Orchestration for Distributed Experiments
abstract: Design document for an orchestration layer that manages distributed simulation experiments using Kubernetes and Python-based workflows.

title: Explainable AI & Scientific Visualization Curriculum
abstract: Curriculum modules linking explainable ML with simulation visualization and computational thinking activities.

title: Learning Analytics for Computational Thinking in Simulation Tasks
abstract: Framework proposal for analyzing student reasoning during simulation-based tasks using learning analytics and adaptive feedback models.
